title: Slab Serif
content:
This is possibly the nicest typeface I've ever seen…could one of you kind people identify it for me please? I need it in my life.

Thanks!

Font: 

 Calson Graphique 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072629/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: paul_w

comments.content: [Caslon Graphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072629/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/caslon+graphique) by William Caslon I and Leslie Usherwood
